name: Backrooms Simulator
description:
Hey!

This is a game that simulates the backrooms.

For now Its only a demo Scene. I am trying to get the ambient right. Then I can start to add Backroom Levels in!

Thanks!

I will work on this game from time to time. I am aiming to implement the first 3 Levels for now. Then see where it goes!

Current Features:

* Endless Level 0 Backroom
